ComicInfo.Summary:
'Trial by Fire,' part 2 of 6. Mark Millar's climactic Swamp Thing storyline continues: As Jason Woodrue seeks help in stopping Swamp Thing's plans to destroy humankind, Timothy Raven prepares to invoke the spirit of Anton Arcane; Lady Jane and the Parliament of Trees face possibly their last stand against The Word; and Abby and Chester make desperate plans of their own.
